issue.title: seed_seq::size no longer useful

discussion.p: One of the motivations for incorporating seed_seq::size() was to simplify the wording in other parts of . As a side effect of resolving related issues, all such references to seed_seq::size() will have been excised. More importantly, the present specification is contradictory, as "The number of 32-bit units the object can deliver" is not the same as "the result of v.size()."
See N2391 and N2423 for some further discussion.

resolution.p: Adopt the proposed resolution in N2423.

issue.note: Kona (2007): The LWG adopted the proposed resolution of N2423 for this issue. The LWG voted to accelerate this issue to Ready status to be voted into the WP at Kona.
